manpage.title: isleadbyte

description.para: The isleadbyte macro returns a nonzero value if its argument is the first byte of a multibyte character.or it returns 0 .

return.para: isleadbyte returns a nonzero value if the argument satisfies the test condition or 0 if it does not.

manpage.result: the first byte of 'k' is not a multibyte character the first byte of '0xD6**' is a multibyte character
